overview: Ha-jin spends his vacation at the house of his married sister, Ha-young. But my sister's husband, Kyungmin, was Hajin's old boyfriend. Ha-jin can't forget Kyung-min even after marriage. Kyungmin also feels sorry for Hajin because of her previous mistakes. In the end, when there are only two, Hajin and Kyungmin share a passionate love...
title: Bad Sister-in-law 2
